name: Soulful
description:
Soulful is a submission to Ludum Dare 45

Game Description

Help no-thing the ghost navigate the crowded Halloween sky and pick up his friends! Grab candies, avoid mimics and dodge the busy ghosts who wish to go about their night undisturbed.

Authors

  • Art - aconfuseddragon
  • SFX - ViktorRKraus
  • Music - Lfob
  • Code - jvolonte
